Package gameObjects

Interface GameLogic

All Known Implementing Classes:
Area, Block, ButtonBlock, Camera, CollisionBlock, Connect4Piece, Enemy, EnemyFighter, Entity, Event, Fighter, Food, GameObject, GraphBlock, Handler, InvisibleObject, LevelArea, LineOfSightBlock, Minotaur, MinotaurFighter, NormalBlock, ObjectHandler, Player, PlayerFighter, Polygon, Rectangle, Shape, TerrainBlock
public interface GameLogic
The Interface GameLogic. All GameObjects should update, render, and initialize themselves

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void init()
    Initializes the object
    void render​(java.awt.Graphics2D g, java.awt.image.ImageObserver observer, float x, float y)
    Render the GameObject onto the screen
    void update​(float elapsedTime)
    Update that is performed every frame

  • Method Details

    • update

      void update​(float elapsedTime)
      Update that is performed every frame
      Parameters:
      elapsedTime - - the time to update - should be close to 1

    • render

      void render​(java.awt.Graphics2D g, java.awt.image.ImageObserver observer, float x, float y)
      Render the GameObject onto the screen
      Parameters:
      g - the g
      observer - the observer
      x - - used to translate the object for camera viewing
      y - - used to translate the object for camera viewing

    • init

      void init()
      Initializes the object
